name: LABHR
tagline: Let's All Build A Hat Rack
body:
Open Source project contribution focuses a lot on the code committed to projects, but there is so much more that goes on behind the scenes that is just as valuable to OSS than the code itself. 

[LABHR](http://hawthornlandings.org/2015/02/13/a-place-to-hang-your-hat/) seeks to thank those that provide these non-code contributions and thank them. 

## Projects

There are ways to programatically find these contributions, depending on what underlying software is being used: 

 * [octohatrack](https://github.com/LABHR/octohatrack) - a GitHub non-code contribution groker
 * more soon...

## Advocates

 * [Leslie Hawthorn](https://github.com/lhawthorn)
 * [Katie McLaughlin](https://github.com/glasnt)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
